pull_requests.title: Update bip-0042.mediawiki
pull_requests.body:
Minor error in grammar.

The "," makes it easier understand on the first read, and prevents several rereading

comment_list.body:
Closing, as this change is not worth requesting valuable and scarce review time, and it adds unneeded noise for subscribers to this repository.

Rather than opening pull requests like this, may I suggest focusing efforts on reviewing pull requests by other contributors. This can be the best way to learn, improve, and add value.
